abstract: It's spring at Martian Outpost 3, the year 2025. The Universe Cup's on later today, and next week little Suzie celebrates her fourth birthday. Fortunately, this football fan and parent will be able to participate in both of these activities, albeit at a slight time delay, due completely to the sophisticated, high-speed quasi-real-time multimedia/navigation MarsNet surrounding Mars and tying it to Earth. Capable of moving gigabits a second in either direction, the network supports not only the multiple manned and robotic science needs of teams and devices encircling Mars, but also the very real human need for communication.
title: Phoning Home from Mars in 2025

organization.name: Jet Propulsion Lab., California Inst. of Tech.

publications.publicationName: Concepts and Approaches for Mars Exploration

related.title: Concepts and Approaches for Mars Exploration
